表格员工表的代码预览

drop index 状态与员工_FK on employee;

drop index 计薪和员工_FK on employee;

drop index 部门与员工_FK on employee;

drop index 门店与人员_FK on employee;

drop index employee_PK on employee;

drop table if exists employee;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: employee */
/*==============================================================*/
create table employee
(
employeeid varchar(50) not null,
propertyid int,
storeid varchar(20),
departmentid int,
stateid int,
empname varchar(50),
esex int,
emplogenid varchar(20),
emplogepaw varchar(20),
education varchar(50),
graduationschool varchar(50),
major varchar(50),
crrdID varchar(20),
address varchar(100),
newaddress varchar(100),
empphone varchar(20),
emergencyphone varchar(20),
molphone varchar(20),
email varchar(50),
entrytimes date,
lztimes date,
brithtimes date,
primary key (employeeid)
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: employee_PK */
/*==============================================================*/
create unique index employee_PK on employee
(
employeeid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 门店与人员_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 门店与人员_FK on employee
(
storeid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 部门与员工_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 部门与员工_FK on employee
(
departmentid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 计薪和员工_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 计薪和员工_FK on employee
(
propertyid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 状态与员工_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 状态与员工_FK on employee
(
stateid
);

alter table employee add constraint FK_状态与员工 foreign key (stateid)
references state (stateid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table employee add constraint FK_计薪和员工 foreign key (propertyid)
references property (propertyid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table employee add constraint FK_部门与员工 foreign key (departmentid)
references department (departmentid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table employee add constraint FK_门店与人员 foreign key (storeid)
references store (storeid) on delete restrict on update restrict;
